name: Juicy Candy Blast
description:
Let's step in the fascinating Wonderland with Alice through her yummy candy journey.
Explore mysterious lands, meet new friends, and embark on an enchanting adventure.
Download Juicy Candy Blast for free now and enjoy jam packed with tasty juice's flavor.
Match 3 lining up candies of the same color to smash the candies. When forming a square candy, butterflies will put a miracle in a random cell.
Match 4 or 5 candies of the same color can help you create fever combos which may blow up all candies in a single move.
When you can't make any move with candy juice. Jam candies will be relocated into new cells.
Pay attention to troublesome spiders, tornadoes or chocolate box before you ran out of move.
Juicy Candy Blast: Alice's sweet dream is free to play but you can buy items such as extra moves or even a powerful candy lollipop with real money.
Juicy candy blast outstanding features:
# Stunning graphics and effects set in a beautiful fairy tale for Alice in Wonderland.
# 100 puzzling levels with different difficulty, divided into 4 game modes
Cookie game modes: Find delicious cookies behind the candy and bring them to the cake lover twins.
Fishing game modes: Candies are hidden below, crush the ice and feed the friendly flamingo
Order modes of play: Collect candy in order to serve friends of Alice
Boss game mode: You may wonder where is the famous Cheshire cat in Alice fairy tale. Stay tuned for his appearance
# Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
